entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 27.

entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 15. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
